item.text: Now Joseph had been brought down to Egypt. An Egyptian named Potiphar, an official of Pharaoh and the captain of the guard, purchased him from the Ishmaelites who had brought him there.
The Lord was with Joseph. He was successful and lived in the household of his Egyptian master.
His master observed that the Lord was with him and that the Lord made everything he was doing successful.

So <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="02580" class="">favor</st> in his <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st> and <st data-num="08334" class="">became</st> his <st data-num="08334" class="">personal attendant</st>.<n id="1" /> Potiphar <st data-num="06485" class="">appointed</st> Joseph<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">overseer</st> of his <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> him <st data-num="03027" class="">in charge</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> he <st data-num="03426" class="">owned</st>.

From the time Potiphar appointed him over his household and over all that he owned, the Lord blessed the Egyptian’s household for Joseph’s sake. The blessing of the Lord was on everything that he had, both in his house and in his fields.

So Potiphar left everything he had in Joseph’s care; he gave no thought to anything except the food he ate.

Now Joseph was well built and good-looking.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Soon</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01697" class="">things</st>, his <st data-num="0113" class="">master’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">took</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">notice</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">of</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="07901" class="">Come to bed</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me.”<n id="2" />

But he <st data-num="03985" class="">refused</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="0113" class="">master’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, “<st data-num="02005" class="">Look</st>, my <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">give</st> any <st data-num="03045" class="">thought</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> me here,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="03426" class="">owns</st> he has <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> into my <st data-num="03027" class="">care</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="0369" class="">There is no</st> one <st data-num="01419" class="">greater</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> I am. He has <st data-num="02820" class="">withheld</st> <st data-num="03808 03972">nothing</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> me <st data-num="03588 0518">except</st> you <st data-num="0834" class="">because</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>. So <st data-num="0349" class="">how</st> could I <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02063" class="">such</st> a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07451" class="">evil</st> and <st data-num="02398" class="">sin</st> against <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>?”
Even though she continued to speak to Joseph day after day, he did not respond to her invitation to go to bed with her.
One day he went into the house to do his work when none of the household servants were there in the house.

She <st data-num="08610" class="">grabbed</st> him by his <st data-num="0899" class="">outer garment</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="07901" class="">Come to bed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me!” But he <st data-num="05800" class="">left</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">outer garment</st> in her <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> and <st data-num="05127 03318">ran</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> she <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="05800" class="">left</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">outer garment</st> in her <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> and had <st data-num="05127" class="">run</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st>,

she <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> for her <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">servants</st> and <st data-num="0559 0559">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="07200" class="">See</st>, my husband <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st><n id="1" /> in a <st data-num="05680" class="">Hebrew</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="2" /> to us to <st data-num="06711" class="">humiliate</st> us.<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="0935" class="">tried</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07901" class="">go to bed</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> me,<n id="4" /> but I <st data-num="07121" class="">screamed</st> <st data-num="06963 01419">loudly</st>.<n id="5" />
When he heard me raise my voice and scream, he left his outer garment beside me and ran outside.”
So she laid his outer garment beside her until his master came home.

<st data-num="0428" class="">This</st> is <st data-num="01697" class="">what</st> she <st data-num="01696 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him:<n id="1" /> “That <st data-num="05680" class="">Hebrew</st> <st data-num="05650 0834">slave</st><n id="2" /> you <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> to us <st data-num="0935" class="">tried</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06711" class="">humiliate</st> me,<n id="3" />
but when I raised my voice and screamed, he left his outer garment and ran outside.”
When his master heard his wife say, “This is the way your slave treated me,” he became furious.
Joseph’s master took him and threw him into the prison, the place where the king’s prisoners were confined. So he was there in the prison.
But the Lord was with Joseph and showed him kindness. He granted him favor in the sight of the prison warden.

The <st data-num="08269" class="">warden</st> <st data-num="05414 01004 05470">put</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0615 0834 01004 05470">prisoners</st> under <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">care</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> in <st data-num="06213" class="">charge</st> of <st data-num="03605 0834">whatever</st> they were <st data-num="06213 08033">doing</st>.<n id="1" />
The warden did not concern himself with anything that was in Joseph’s care because the Lord was with him and whatever he was doing the Lord was making successful.
